phases.label: PHASE 1: MANDATORY
phases.title: AI Foundations
phases.description: This foundational phase is designed for all team members. In just two weeks, everyone will become comfortable and proficient with using AI for their core daily tasks, from writing emails to sourcing candidates.

modules.title: Prompting & Writing — The C.R.E.A.T.E. Framework
modules.description: Learn the C.R.E.A.T.E. framework — a structured approach (Character, Request, Examples, Additions, Type, Extras) for crafting precise, repeatable, high-quality prompts.

modules.title: Sourcing & Research
modules.description: Generate complex Boolean strings and perform rapid market analysis.

phases.label: PHASE 2: OPTIONAL
phases.title: The AI Champions Track
phases.description: This track is for team members who want to go deeper. Champions will learn advanced skills like data analysis, workflow automation, and how to build custom AI tools, positioning them as mentors and subject matter experts.

modules.title: Data & Knowledge
modules.description: Analyze data in Sheets and build a "CV Bot" to search documents.

modules.title: Automation
modules.description: Build hands-free workflows that connect Gmail, AI, and Sheets.

modules.title: Train the Trainer
modules.description: Learn to mentor colleagues and present your projects to leadership.

phases.label: PHASE 3: LEADERSHIP
phases.title: AI for RPO Strategists
phases.description: This executive stream is for Department Heads and Team Leads. The focus shifts from hands-on skills to strategic planning, governance, and measuring the business value and ROI of AI initiatives.

modules.title: Strategy & Governance
modules.description: Develop an RPO-specific AI roadmap and prioritize high-impact projects.

modules.title: Measuring Impact
modules.description: Define success metrics and build a compelling business case for AI projects.
